name: Angry Ninja
description:
Controls:

Use the W,S,D buttons to move up, down, and right

Collect ninja stars to build ammunition and shoot with the Space button

The rice bowl makes you invincible for a few seconds.

This is a mini game created by myself and my friend helped with the sound.

Hope you guys find it fun and well if it gets much popularity there can be more levels later on or who knows whatever else.. Open to opinions and suggestions.
